# Government Tender Announcement

## Bulk Real Property Data for Canadian Residents

### Tender Information

- **Title:** Bulk Real Property Data
- **Reference Number:** cb-248-33410701
- **Amendment Number:** 3
- **Solicitation Number:** 1000459823

### Key Dates

- **Publication Date:** 2024-01-08
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-07T14:00:00
- **Amendment Date:** 2024-02-07

### Contract Details

- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and others (refer to government website for full list)

### Geographical Scope

- **Regions of Opportunity:** World
- **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

### Contact Information

- **Contact Name:** Chrystal Imbeau
- **Contact Email:** chrystal.imbeau@cra-arc.gc.ca
- **Contact Phone:** (343) 598-0108

### Downloadable Documents

- [Contract](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28841/1000459823_model-contract_e.pdf)
- [Statement of Work](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28841/1000459823_statement-of-work_e.pdf)
- [Request for Information](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28841/1000459823_rfi_e.pdf)

*Note: French language attachments are available upon request.*

### Tender Description

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking bulk real property data for residential and commercial properties in countries where a Canadian is involved in a real estate transaction. The required regions include Central America, South America, North America (Mexico), and the Caribbean. Respondents must be able to provide historical data for these regions. The CRA requires this information for its compliance with tax-related obligations. Respondents should refer to the contract and statement of work documents for more detailed requirements and specifications.


# End of Tender Notice ((Equals sign))
